text: Anna Chlumsky (born December 3, 1980 in Chicago) is an American movie and television actress. She played the character Vada in the 1991 movie My Girl and My Girl 2 in 1994. She got her start in 1989 in the movie Uncle Buck. She stopped acting for a while but recently worked on the show Veep on HBO as Amy Brookheimer. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1980 births Category:Living people
title: Anna Chlumsky
